0x2B12B6FC8B8772AB.name: _SET_DEADEYE_ENTITY_GLOW_WITH_FLAG
0x2B12B6FC8B8772AB.comment:
Applies a glow effect to nearby entities when Deadeye is active, based on a flag parameter. This includes humans, animals, vehicles, and horses pulling those vehicles. Additionally, depending on the flag value, the player's appearance may change (e.g., turning gray).
flag 2 is people 4 is animal in the decompiles 8 and 25 also can be used
